title: LG 8kg Front Load Washing Machine
short_description: LG 8kg front load washing machine with 6 Motion Direct Drive technology.
detailed_description: The LG 8kg front load washing machine offers powerful and gentle washing with its 6 Motion Direct Drive technology. It adjusts washing motions based on the fabric type to reduce wear and tear while providing deep cleaning. It also has a smart diagnosis feature for troubleshooting.

title: Samsung 7kg laptop
short_description: Samsung 7kg top load washing machine with Wobble technology.
detailed_description: The Samsung 7kg top load washing machine features Wobble technology to prevent tangling while providing a powerful yet gentle wash. The machine includes multiple wash programs for different fabrics and a magic filter to trap lint.

title: Whirlpool 10kg Semi-Automatic Washing Machine
short_description: Whirlpool 10kg semi-automatic washing machine with turbo scrub technology.
detailed_description: The Whirlpool 10kg semi-automatic washing machine is equipped with turbo scrub technology for a thorough cleaning experience. It has a large wash tub, effective drying, and multiple wash modes to cater to different fabric types.
